Label: Organization
Description: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.

Label: Class
Description: The class of classes.

Label: Class
Description: The class of OWL classes.

Label: Hardware
Description: Represents hardware products that are part of a secure supply chain.

Label: Hardware Version
Description: Represents a specific version of a hardware product within the secure chain.

Label: License
Description: Represents licenses associated with software or hardware products in the secure supply chain.

Label: Software
Description: Represents software applications that are part of a secure supply chain.

Label: Software Version
Description: Represents a specific version of a software application within the secure chain.

Label: Vulnerability
Description: Represents vulnerabilities that may affect software or hardware components in the secure supply chain.

Label: Vulnerability Type
Description: Represents types or classifications of vulnerabilities affecting secure supply chains.

Label: identifier
Description: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc.

Label: manufacturer
Description: The manufacturer of the product.

Label: name
Description: The name of the item.

Label: domain
Description: A domain of the subject property.

Label: range
Description: A range of the subject property.

Label: subClassOf
Description: The subject is a subclass of a class.

Label: sameAs
Description: The property that determines that two given individuals are equal.

Label: unionOf
Description: The property that determines the collection of classes or data ranges that build a union.

Label: cpe23
Description: Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) 2.3 identifier for software or hardware.

Label: has Hardware Version
Description: Indicates the relationship between a hardware product and its version.

Label: version Name
Description: Represents the version name of a software or hardware product.

Label: vulnerability Type
Description: Associates a vulnerability with its specific type or classification.

Label: vulnerable To
Description: Indicates that a particular version of software is vulnerable to a specific vulnerability.
